title: I didnt Realize i couldn't Gift Pulsefire Ezreal...
body:
I just want to know if i could receive help maybe taking out the RP for Pulsefire Ezreal but giving the skin to PopTart Kittenz? He's my boyfriend and i really wanted to surprise him with a skin saying it was from me. Next time i'll remember not to put the rp on my account.

PS I'm not one for begging....
but PLEASE! your my only hope!

replies.body: Aww wow that's so sweet! <3 <3  If he's already been unlocked on your account, you should be able to use a refund token then use the RP through the gifting center.  If you run into any issues or run out of tokens, though, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  I can't make any guarantees, but we'll see if there's anything we can do with your specific request.  :D

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=HWXhphbT,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-29T20:37:25.580+0000)
>
> Aww wow that's so sweet! <3 <3  If he's already been unlocked on your account, you should be able to use a refund token then use the RP through the gifting center.  If you run into any issues or run out of tokens, though, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  I can't make any guarantees, but we'll see if there's anything we can do with your specific request.  :D

Thanks, I don't actually have any tokens, but i'll put in a support ticket and see if they can help me get PopTart that skin. :3 thank you for helping me <3
So I put in a ticket, I hope it works out. :3{{summoner:31}}
